name: Skartorsis

skills.desc: Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff and a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
skills.name: Command

skills.desc: Heals all allies, then removes all debuffs from them. The amount by which each ally is healed increases according to the number of debuffs on them. The amount by which each ally's Turn Meter is filled increases according to the number of debuffs on them.
skills.name: Rebirth
